description:
Next Porto.Data meetup we will be dedicated to an Overview of Windows Server 2019 and we are happy to have two experts to talk about it.

Our invited speakers, Hélio Martins (http://linkedin.com/in/hamartins) with Master Degree in Computer Science and more than 10 years working on different environments. Particular interest in Microsoft technologies.
Interest in design, architecture and implementation of new solutions, and
Nuno Silva (https://www.linkedin.com/in/nuno-silva-0ab38a10/), with a Master Degree in Computer Science area and more than 15 years working in IT accumulating knowledge and experience in several technologies, industries and cultures. Exchanging this knowledge and experience with others on daily basis helps in grow, stay motivated while generating new ideas and learn even more.

Agenda
• Welcome
• "What's new in Windows Server 2019" by Hélio Martins & Nuno Silva with Hands-On:
Windows Admin Center
Windows Server Core
Storage Spaces Direct
• Coffee break & networking
• Closing

After the event we invite everyone to join us for a coffee break.
name: Porto.Data #50 What's new in Windows Server 2019
